Bone Armor

armor (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 235
armor id [armor]: 51 (Bone Armor)
defence [def]: -3
encumbrance [enc]: 3
resist cold [coldres]: +5
(provides-soul-vortex [soulvortex])

Requires 25D to forge (D4)

Armor crafted from the ribs of lepers, it is inscribed with runes that leech the life force from living beings and grant that energy to its wearer. It also partially protects its wearer from cold.
